{"id":1230296544,"question_id":3,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 days, 22 hours","timestamp":1712920379,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1230296544/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"44.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        HashSet<Character> set = new HashSet<>();\n        int max = 0;\n        int left = 0; // Starting index of the current substring\n        // Sliding Window\n        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {\n            // If the character is already in the set, move the left pointer to the right\n            // until the duplicate character is removed from the set\n            while (set.contains(c)) {\n                set.remove(s.charAt(left));\n                left++;\n            }\n            // Add the current character to the set\n            set.add(c);\n            // Update the maximum length of the substring\n            max = Math.max(max, set.size());\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
